column10: Three way intersection with no stop signs from any direction (every one has right of way?). Poor visibility due to pared cars. May be city liability for missing stop sign(s); Missing stop sign(s)
Intersection lacks any stop signs at all. Unclear who has right of way. One of the few intersections in SE without 4 way stop.

There are no stop signs here from any direction, possible City liability; Missing stop sign(s); Three way intersection missing at least one stop sign, likely liability of City for not posting right of way (everyone can’t have right of way)
column21: Three way intersection missing at least one stop sign, likely liability of City for not posting right of way (everyone can’t have right of way)
